name: M∀LICE CODE MTP-07
desc: You can activate this card the turn it was Set, by banishing 1 face-up "M∀LICE" monster you control. Add 1 "M∀LICE" monster from your Deck to your hand, then, if you control a "M∀LICE" Link Monster, you can banish 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "M∀LICE MTP-07" per turn.
